alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 8:52AM CDT until June 10 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Union County in south central Arkansas... Northeastern Columbia County in southwestern Arkansas... Union Parish in north central Louisiana... Northeastern Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 930 AM CDT. * At 851 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lisbon to near Wesson to 6 miles southwest of Lawson to near Moro Bay State Park to near Ingalls, moving southeast at 50 mph. Downed trees were reported earlier with this line of storms. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Huttig, Junction City, Farmerville, Bernice, Strong, Mount Holly, Wesson, Lisbon, Urbana, Lawson, Cooley, Lapile, Moro Bay State Park, Marion, Felsenthal, Spearsville, Lillie, Newell and New London. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
